Python is a powerful program to  biologists who work with DNA sequencing. Sequence alignment is one use to scientists. Global and local alignment can be done throuugh Smith Waterman algorithm and Needleman-Wunsch. In addition, BLAST, a popular method among gentists, can be performed in python.
